column1: '''Morthond''' is the fourth track of [[Minas Morgul (album)|Minas Morgul]]
column2: an album by [[Tolkien metal]] band [[Summoning]]. The name of the song is taken from the river [[Morthond]] in [[Gondor]].

column1: We heard horns in hills ringing
Steeds went striding to the Stoningland
As winds in morning. War was there.
Death in the morning and at day's end
Grey now as tears gleaming silver
Foam dyed with blood flamed at a sunset
As flowers mountains burned at evening
